title: Irelands Finest with Joanne McNally | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | BONUS EP
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 

Chrissy Chaos is joined by comedian Joanne McNally! Chris is bringing the CHAOS to Ireland! Who is the Jesus of Ireland?! Chris gets introduced to some new Irish slang words and the lifestyle of the Irish. Shout out  @Jessica Kirson   and Des Bishop! The differences between the comedy scene in New York and Ireland. Chris breaks down his current relationship status. Is stand up comedy oversaturated? What does Ireland think of Trump. Avril lavigne is acting strange at meet and greets. Go see the CHAOS in Ireland babes!

Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep!
patreon.com/chrisdcomedy

SUPPORT THE SPONSORS TO SUPPORT THE CHAOS
Download the Dave app from the App store right now. Sign up for an Extra Cash account
and get up to 500 dollars instantly. For terms and conditions go to dave.com/legal
adadmandeve.com code chaos
hellofresh.com/chaos65 code chaos65

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​
